info.name: The Escapist - Mobile Popular/Comments fix
info.description: This style fixes the broken positioning of the "Latest","Popular" and "Comments" buttons on the Mobile version of The Escapist's main webpage.
info.additionalInfo: Note that this only fixes the positioning of the buttons and the sub menu beneath them, the disappearing of the Day - Week - Month - All text on some browsers can't be fixed with purely CSS.
